text:

TV presenter Carol Vorderman has revealed her mum has been diagnosed with terminal cancer. 
The former Countdown host shared the heartbreaking news with fans on Mother's Day. 
The Loose Women star wrote on Twitter: "A precious Mother's Day x This wk Mum & I found out she has terminal cancer.She's 88,beautiful inside and out &I love her beyond measure x"
